snippet: Unisplendour, a hardware producer and vendor, has agreed to pay $3.78 billion to the American maker of hard disk drives.
abstract: Chinese hardware maker Unisplendour agrees to purchase 15 percent stake in hard disk drive maker Western Digital for $3.78 billion.
lead_paragraph: Unisplendour, a hardware producer and vendor, has agreed to pay $3.78 billion to the American maker of hard disk drives.

headline.main: Unisplendour of China Buys 15% Stake in Western Digital
headline.print_headline: A Big Chinese Hardware Maker Agrees to Buy a 15% Stake in Western Digital
